sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import ReactTooltip from 'react-tooltip' function CourseItem({image, name, priceHalf, priceQuart, priceHour, description, details}) { return (

{name}

30 min: ${priceHalf}

45 min: ${priceQuart}

60 min: ${priceHour}

{details}

Login to register
) } export default CourseItem
